review_title: Lots of bugs on ipad pro 10.5 inch
review: There are various bugs while playing on my device. Such as, when i dies and spectating my teammates, i weren't able to do that because my teammates will only walking on their position and doing nothing until the match is over. And another example, if i tried to relog in into the game while in a match, I'll just be alone in the game without encountering any player and just hearing sounds. And what's more annoying is the other player are able to see me including my teammates and enemies would just simply knocked me down without me being able to defense myself. And when it happens, my location on my screen and my location that other player see is far different, it almost takes about 600 meters far. Please elaborate and fix this bug, thanks.

review_title: Good game but needs improvement for fair gameplay
review: Since the 1.5 update, i've really enjoyed fair fire rate with different fps, and the spam crouch, and the ipad view, that was really good. However i would like to see ipads beeing allowed in official tournaments again and also i've realised that the movement of after 1.5 update gor slower, and i think i love the old movement speed better. Also a lot of people were also sad about the quick prone technique, i hope that you will bring that back. I've also noticed that when you scope with crouch or spam crouch, it glithces the screen and tends to ruin our aim, hopefully you guys can fix this. Overall in my opinion, 1.5 update is already awesome, but i'm hoping that the 1.6 update will fix this and hopefully bring back same old good features back, and have vikendi back. Thanks PUBGM
